title: MOTOROLA ZX2 100 cm (40 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV with Dolby Atmos and Dolby Vision  (40SAFHDME)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Television Set, Remote Control, Wallmount Stand, 2 AAA Batteries, Desktop Stand, 2 Stand Support Screws, Quick Setup Guide, Power Cord, AV Converting Cable
product_specification.Sound Technology: Dolby Atmos, DTS Studio Sound, Dolby Audio
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 360 Degree Surround Sound Feel with Dolby Atmos, 20 W High Bass Speakers, 20 W High Octave Tweeters, 4 Unit Setup, Amphisoundx Pro Soundbar
product_specification.Processor: MediaTek CA53 Quad Core at 1.5 GHz
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar, Eros Now, Sony Live, Hungama, Zee5
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Powered by Dolby Vision & Dolby Atmos: Experience stories come alive with innovative and powerful cinematic technologies from Dolby suite - Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos. Dolby Vision enables unprecedented levels of viewing clarity, while Dolby Atmos makes for sound in 3 dimensions.
product_description.AutoTuneX+ Display with Adaptive Gamma: Powered by AutoTuneX+ Technology, this TV adjusts picture settings automatically for an immersive viewing experience based on the content being shown. Dolby Vision enables dynamic metadata from scene to scene i.e., picture changes, contrast, brightness, and hue levels from scene to scene rather than one constant brightness, contrast level throughout. Also, it is powered with Adaptive Gamma that adjusts the Gamma in PQ for true grey levels. This TV also facilitates online streaming in 4K.

Excellent Led Smart Tv this Range
Sound quality excellent
Net connectivity excellent
Remote looking also excellent
Google assistant also excellent

This TV is a great purchase with all the lastest features. With Android 10, the TV is super smooth and the boot time is very very less as compared to other TVs. And also it boots up extremely fast if it is in stand by mode. Picture quality is just awesome and it is able to play 4K videos from youtube and at the same time it supports dolby vision which makes the picture quality more awesome (the video which you are playing should be Dolby vision as well). I did not have any connectivity issues till now. It connects to wifi very quickly and casting is pretty smooth (you need to have a good internet connection which will give you the best experience as far as the connectivity is concerned). I tried playing videos using a pendrive and it could play videos from there as well. Bluetooth pairing is fast and it can work as a transmiter and as well as receiver. From play store u can download a lot of apps. I did not try playing games till now. Only app i could not find is JioTV. Sound quality is excellent and it can get very loud (25% is quite loud for me) and dont forget to switch on dolby atmos. The remote is bluetooth paired and it works from anywhere as long as it is connected. TV installation was done by jeeves and the service engineer was well educated about the TV and installation was done very quickly and perfectly. He aslo gave a demo about the TV features and showed every thing he could. Overall I am happy with the TV, flikart's delivery, packaging and installation. I hope the TV will keep working good and also hoping for motorola's support in case of any issues.

Overall i am happy with the product and i would definitely recommend buying this.

Motorola ZX2 is a solid device overall. The overall performance is satisfactory and so is the picture quality. This is the best smartTV in this price range. The device comes with 40W AmphiSoundX Pro Audio and has Android 10 which is first in this class. This is world's 1st HD TV with Dolby Vision & Atmos which is another USP of this smartTV. It offers good value for its price.

Kudos to Flipkart on super fast delivery much before the promised delivery date.

Value for money deal at 20k

Pros:-
- sound quality is loud and good as you are getting 40watt speaker
- Picture quality is also good. Don't compare it with Sony TV but still better at this price
- two way Bluetooth. You can make this TV to receive audio (like from your phone like headphone) or transmit to external Audio system like home theatre system.
- TV stand or wall mount piece in package is innovative and very simple, yet sturdy.
- TV remote has voice recognition - Google assistance built-in
- It's very light weight
- Delivery and installation was quick from Flipkart
- It has latest Android operating system
- 2Gb RAM and 16Gb ROM is no other TV offering you in this range as on today.
Note :- Its customized product in coordination with Flipkart and Motorola.

Cons :
Not much if you consider at this price range, but good for once information
- In source button at Remote, you won't find Us option. It's has all options like AV, HDMI etc...but for USB drive, you have to go through inbuilt app as media browser. This could have made simple by keeping it as a part of source button which is more logical way
- The sound could have been with more baas. For music lovers, it may be disappointing. You have to use external woofer or home theatre.
- Some channels like DD National, I could not foud easily. It couldn't be installed from playstore, but it's available under ZEE5 group of channels. We should have options to tag the favourite channels on walls which seems missing or I need to explore more.
- the RYBG buttons on remote is of no use as per technician. I'm wondering why company would increase the remote size if of no use. But I guess it would be if you use normal dish/cable TV...which is not confirmed yet as I'm not using it. Good if company can explain or provide manual for use.
- the manual with set is very basic 4page. No details if you don't have tech assistant. Big gap from company.

Verdict - If you are standard user, with Little more than basic entertainment requirements...this is best value for money. Close your eyes and go ahead. Good product from Motorola and Flipkart

Pros:
1. Picture quality is amazing.

2. Build quality is top notch .

3. The remote is very responsive. It catches voice commands very easily.

4. Sound is very loud and clear.

Area of improvement:

1. I wish the sound were little bit more bassy. Being a bass lover I miss it. Considering its 40 W sound output, woofer like bass could have worked like wonders.

2. It's a bit unresponsive although very rarely .

3. Aspect ratio could have been worked upon .

4. Power consumption is on the higher size. May be because of its 40 W sound output.

Overall it's a decent purchase. I would recommend you all to go for it. Some pictures are attached to give you some ideas regarding the Tv set.

Best smart led below 20k. You can't get such features even in 30k+ tv. After using it for last 10 days i have some pros and cons
Pros
1. Dolby atmos makes you sound experience to next level, specially in watching sports and 2 speaker and 2 tweeters makes sound loud and clear
2. Dolby vision and capability of playing 4k content makes the display quality better, even it is hd panel but picture quality feels like full hd.
3. 2gb ram and 16gb storage makes it easy to download more apps and play games also.

5. Dual band wifi support gives you strong net connectivity and speed.
6. Fully functional big remote gives you more control than regular android tv remote, 4hot keys, dpad control, numeric keypad, forward, backward, play, pause keys makes it easy to navigate and control.
7. Wall mount bracket is provided with tv.
8. 2 usb port, 2 hdmi port, digital audio output makes it easy for connectivity also it supports hdmi 2.0 support and arc support.

Cons

Everybody talks about how great it's sound but you don't know the hard truth.
Im disappointed with its speaker

Let me explain.

The sub frequency is cutoff to 90hrtz. Which means you won't get subbass.
Although you can get decent top bass ,mid and high.
I tested between Dolby Atmos and DTS , in my opinion dts gives the best depth to the sound but...., again NO sub frequency!
:- what it means to you!?
Means you won't be able to enjoy music. It'll sound like extended version of mobile/laptop speakers



Pitcher quality.
Display have too much of noise on its default settings.
I did some tweaks over the period of 7 days.
Brightness 51
Contrast 49
Saturation 48
Set as warm
Gamma set as bright.
Goto advance , first luma control to low and second luma control to medium. Or do the vise versa.

Connectivity.
Screen mirroring works fine. But sometimes it slowls down but wait I found the solution. Just disconnect if its slow and reconnect again. Do this 2-3 times or more it'll get fixed.
Wifi and Bluetooth works fine.

Also download duck duck go browser (other browser not working/ not installed), jiotv from third-party apks , might helpful

Overall good tv but if it had a sub bass it would be perfect deal.

Review after initial usage.

Panel Quality is very cheap. I mean like seriously cheap. Amusingly the model name of the TV is Flipkart TV everywhere and not ZX2, so it makes me think whether its just a rebrand of Marq TVs! Side by side compared it with MI 40 inch and Sony Bravia 32".

Picture and Sound Quality of 4 Years old Sony Bravia is way better than this. In terms of MI, picture quality of MI was found to be better with more accurate colours, whereas sound was bit better of Motorola.

Also, my sony has 30 watt speakers which is way louder and better than Motorola 40 watt speakers with Dolby Atmos. Almost double. So it is not actually 40 watt speakers but 20 actually at max.

Another problem I encountered was that with every Boot Up, the TV first enters into channel scan or whaterver source mode you have kept(say hdmi 1) default and you need to press home to go to smart tv android homepage. It wont directly boot up to android tv home page like every other android tv and there is no option to change. A big con for me who just wants to use smart tv features like Netflix and Prime videos etc. and doesn't need to use any type of input source. With every bit I have to hit an extra button to use my tv normally.

Pros : 1. Connectivity options
2. Good Processor.
3. Ram and storage
4. Dolby Audio and Video
5. Remote with some extra features
6. 4K runs on YouTube, Prime Video and Netflix automatically.
7. Latest Android
8. Metal Stands

Cons : 1. Flipkart TV and not Motorola.
2. No different than previous android version. Exactly same.
3. Sound Quality not as good as advertised.
4. Picture quality and colors not at all upto the expectations
5. Cheap Panel Quality.
6. Very short lenght of Power Cord.
7. No external adapter present on the power adapter
8. Google Assistant was having alot of troubles recognizing voices but not sure because I had plastic cover on the remote.
9. No apps button on tv remote.
10. Bulky remote. MI remote is by far the sleekest best remote.


Will edit with every discovery.

Also, if flipkart rejects my review, I am suing them for fraud and hiding facts and misappropriation of reviews on a product page.

Edit 1(29/11/20) - Software is extremely buggy and there is not a single software update or fix since launch. Also, motorola customer support is really worthless and unhelpful. They dont even know their own product. They just sold their brand name rights to flipkart. Flipkart is manufacturing, servicing, marketing and selling the TV. Motorola just gave its name. It seems a star will start to fall from my review with every passing month. Serious TBH. Best if you just want to enjoy normal live tv from your cable or dth operator. Bad for Android TV and OTT experience.

The best 32" Smart TV.
.
Installation was done on the 4th day of delivering the product.
.
The TV is very smooth. This product has the best CPU and and a faster GPU and also has more RAM and ROM in this segment. Which ensures a fluid experience all the time.
.
It comes with Android 10 out of the box and the fluidity shows how well configured this chipsets are with the latest OS.
.
One can play contents on Hotstar, Prime Video, Netflix, YouTube smoothly even on 4k.
.
It has more RAM and Storage then any other TV in this segment, which will ensure it won't go slow even after the future updates.
.
Picture quality is superb.
The Vivid profile is high in contrast and personally I felt like it makes content more bluish rather than making it colorful.
Personally I like the Movie profile as it has decent contrast, sharpness and a bit flat profile.
.
It has VA panel so it looses clarity marginally (becomes little whiteish) if you watch TV from sides. (But why would anyone do that).
.
It supports and plays HDR content smoothly. One can see HDR notification popping on the top left screen while playing a HDR content.
.
It supports Dolby Vision, but off course you will need to watch a Dolby Vision content to enable it.
.
Sound quality is loud and clear. But obvious we get 40W Sound System with Dolby Atmos and DTS Sound.
.
The Remote is fantastic. It has all the buttons required. (Not like the new types which has very less buttons, in which you had to press more buttons to do a certain task)
.
I wish they had included a remote hard case. (As I don't think there's any physical ON - OFF switch on the TV). If something goes wrong with the remote, you won't be able to turn ON or OFF your TV.
.
Personally I felt, the WIFI chipset used is a bit of a lower range. Coz I can connect to WIFI on my One Plus device but on TV it shows out of range. (Using my old android device as wifi repeater)
.
Also something is wrong with the Chromecast, while I played a movie the audio and video was out of sync. And a major drawback is you need an active connection (data) to connect via Chromecast.
.
The back side of the TV becomes very very hot after just a hour of usage. I hope it will survive the heat. (If something burns because of the heat, I don't think they will cover it in the warranty).
.
PS: This TV's are manufactured by Flipkart, which means all the after sales services will be provided by Jeeves. And almost everyone knows how highly negligible they are with there product services.
In case you don't know, you should google "Jeeves after sales services on Quora or YouTube anywhere you like".

I am writing the review after using the TV for over a week.

Dolby Atmos: The sound quality is very good; one can distinctly hear all the beats. Further, one can choose a user mode, if interested, but I quite like the auto mode.

Dolby Vision: Given that it is an FHD and not a UHD, the picture quality is very good. One should not expect a UHD quality on this TV. Then the colours rendered are crisp. The black colour is pure black and the white colour is pure white without any blue tint which is very good. All other colours are distinct. I found that, in auto mode, the dimming or brightening was not as efficient as I expected but I used the user settings as per my choice and I am happy with the output.

Operating System: The TV got about 1GB download at the time of installation to upgrade itself to the latest Android 10. Android 10 brings with itself a lot of benefits like dark mode, an efficient operating system, etc. Hope, Motorola provides continuous updates and upgrades.

One thing I liked was that the TV remembers the last few operations quite well, so when you press the back button, it will play the last item that was being played, so you don't have to go and search that channel again.

Remote Control: Remote control could have been slicker. It has lots of buttons which are useless for the TV. If someone is using a dish TV, maybe it was more useful. I expected a smaller and simpler remote control with fewer buttons like most of the other brands are providing.

The icing on the cake is Flipkart's unmatched customer care.
